results.title: Australian diary. No. 044
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: This newsreel features the Garden City of Launceston in Tasmania and its beautiful surrounding countryside. Giant pipes made in an Adelaide factory bring water from the Murray River to South Australia. The tourist attractions of Hayman Island on the Great Barrier Reef are shown. Hollywood comes to Australia as on the set of the film ‘Kangaroo’ made at a studio near Port Augusta, actress Maureen O’Hara is sprayed with DDT to keep off the flies!
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board

results.title: Australian diary. No. 043
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: migrants learn to be Australian citizens; the fine art of trout fishing is diplayed; and a closer look at tennis raquets which will help Australian players win prestigious trophies like the Davis Cup.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 041
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: J. Rosetti of Sydney and his collegues and apprentices demonstrate the stages of making a large stained glass window, an ancient art. A pet rabbit has a tea party as a young Sydney child puts on a tea party for her pets. Cane growing from soil preparation and planting to carting to the mill in the cane growing bely in Queensland and northern NSW is shown.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board

results.brief_description: A cinemagazine which features the following items: an Australian inventor perfects a novel lawnmower; billiards champion makes the game look easy; and the Junior branch of the Red Cross is featured.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 039
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: A poultry farm at Werribbe Victoria is shown producing eggs by the million. The latest design for a three way hat designed by Australian milliner John Pickworth ius revealed. Baby animlas at Taronga Park Zoo are favourites. The process of reclaiming salt from the sea and a salt refinery in South Australia are shown. Big game fishing - shark and marlin are caught near Sydney.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board

results.title: Australian diary. No. 036
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The sculling skill of the Towns family are featured in this newsreel. Sydney holds an export packaging display, while apiarists move their bees to new blossoms. A memorial in Canberra honours the deeds of US Forces.
